name: LEONHARD KURZ Stiftung & Co. KG
goal:
Providing input to the Commission on physical and digital security solutions for products and documents such as
optical security features, serialization for tracking & tracing, mobile applications, secure data base services.
interests: Customs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation
euInitiatives:
- Tobacco Products Directive (2014/40/EU) of the European Parliament and of the Council
- Falsified Medicines Directive (2011/62/EU) of the European Parliament and of the Council
